data.text: @ts561kim Hi, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

urls.title: Réclamation – Comment pouvons-nous vous aider? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Nous voulons que votre expérience TAP soit la meilleure possible. Informez-nous de la situation afin que nous résolvions le problème ou consultez l’état d'une réclamation.

data.text:
@mizlizgomis Bonjour Liz,
Nous vous prions d'accepter toutes nos excuses pour ce désagrément, nous sommes désolés que votre expérience n'a pas été à la hauteur de vos attentes. (1/2)
@MiloszBartnik @tapportugalair Thank you

@MiloszBartnik @tapportugalair We thank you for the data provided. We notice that the claim submitted belongs to Brussels Airlines. As such and for further details on the progress of your luggage claim, you will need to contact Brussels Airlines. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions.

🔍 Próxima escapadinha?
➡️ Nice - uma encantadora cidade francesa que promete cultura, beleza natural e glamour.
Aproveitem os melhores preços e reservem já a vossa viagem em https://t.co/Se1SPY17q1.
O transporte gratuito de 🧳 e 🎒 na cabine está incluído em todas as tarifas. https://t.co/gvc8Wb6rQE

urls.title: Voos Baratos para Nice (NCE) desde 54 EUR | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Está à procura de voos baratos para Nice (NCE)? Encontre as melhores ofertas de voos para Nice com a TAP, companhia aérea líder em Portugal.

data.text:
🔍 Next quick get away?
➡️ Nice - a charming French city that promises culture, natural beauty and a lot of glamour.
Enjoy the best prices and book your trip now at https://t.co/vP9InN0qHN.
The free transportation of a 🧳 and 🎒 in the cabin is included in all our fares. https://t.co/ijZdyZA6Kj

urls.title: Cheap Flights to Nice (NCE) from USD 360 | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Searching for cheap flights to Nice (NCE)? Find the best flight deals to Nice with TAP Air - Portugal's leading airline.

data.text: @RuiSalgueiro6 Olá Rui, lamentamos imenso a situação. De forma a verificar o sucedido, pedimos que nos indique o código da reserva. Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@eschfelipe96 @tapportugalair Los valores aplicados se ajustan a las normas establecidas para estos casos. Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional. Gracias.

@eschfelipe96 @tapportugalair Hola! Lamentamos la demora en nuestra respuesta. Aunque comprendemos sus consideraciones, le informamos de que es responsabilidad del pasajero confirmar los nombres registrados en la reserva antes de continuar con el pago.
@tifko @TAP_AIRLINE Hello! We deeply regret the delay of your luggage as well as the delay in our reply. If we can still assist you, please DM us your lost luggage claim number. Thank you in advance.

@MiloszBartnik @tapportugalair Hello! We deeply regret the delay in our reply as well as the delay of your luggage. If we can still assist you, please DM us your lost luggage claim number. Thank you in advance

@Kopkus78 @tapportugalair @TapportugalR Hi! We are truly sorry for the late reply and for all the inconvenience and distress caused by the situation described. If our assistance is still needed, please send us a DM. Thank you in advance

@GBaratech @consumidorglob Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Si todavia es necesaria nuestra ayuda, por favor envíe un mensaje directo con el número de reclamación y el correo electrónico asociado. Gracias.

@krusi_chicho Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused. We regret we couldn't accomplish your expectations and we will make our best efforts to prevent this situation from occurring again. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you
@MikRCT Hi! We deeply regret the situation described. If our assistance is still required, please send us a DM. Thank you in advance.

@BrunoBotMacaes Hello Bruno,
We are very sorry that your experience with us was not positive. We hope that we will be able to better assist you in the future.
In the meantime, if there is anything else we can help you with, please let us know.
Thank you for your understanding.

@raheel1979 Hello, in order to verify your question, please provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number and the new travel date. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text: @wcterror Olá chichitas, lamentamos imenso a situação. Caso possamos prestar assistência, solicitamos que nos indique, por mensagem privada, o código da sua reserva. Obrigado.
@BeatrizRumbo Por razones de confidencialidad, por favor indique las informaciones a través de DM. (2/2)

@Eurtourism Hello السياحة الاوروبية, can you please clarify the situation and provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number? For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text: @0xAdmiral Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you. (II/II)

@0xAdmiral Hello Admiral, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. We inform you that, if you reach the boarding gate with cabin baggage that exceeds the allowed weight, size or number, it will be carried as checked luggage and a fee will be applied. (I/II)

@FKabache Bonjour! Après vérification, nous regrettons de vous informer que vos lunettes n'ont pas été retrouvées ou récupérées. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute aide complémentaire. Merci d'avance.

@MacaesBruno Hello Bruno, we are deeply sorry that our services did not meet your expectations. Providing a service of excellence was, is, and always will be TAP motto. In case we can be of further assistance, please let us know. Thank you.
@Ethan_Travels When we receive a feedback, we will contact you by DM. Thank you
@renato_ravn Hi Renato, it is just necessary to insert the last surname of each passenger. Thank you
@Ethan_Travels Hi Ethan, as soon as we have feedback, we will contact you. Thank you
@GiuseppePeltron Hi Giuseppe, please accept our apologies for the situation and all the distress caused. We don't have feedback yet, but as soon as we have, we will contact you. Thank you
@CarreyMartnRock Hi Carrey, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@AnthonyArmasH_ Hola Anthony, gracias por sus palabras. ✈️
@Llcchaves Olá L, qual o número de processo de mala perdida que abriu no aeroporto por favor? Sugerimos os dados por DM. Obrigado

@coffeeyesplease Olá Wilson,

já estamos em contato consigo via Facebook 😉

data.text:
@HannahK24112000 Hello Hannah,

can you inform us through DM your complaint file number and email address related so we may verify? Thank you.

@FKabache Bonjour Fabrice,
Jusqu'à présent, nous n'avons aucune information.
Nous vous contacterons dès que'on a des informations supplémentaires.
En attendant, nous restons à votre disposition pour tout renseignement complémentaire. Merci pour votre compréhension et patience.
@viral_1991 In that case it will be the border control authorities, SEF - Serviço de Estrangeiros e Fronteiras.

@viral_1991 Hello Viral Vyas,

since the airlines won't be in charge of that control we kindly ask you to contact the responsible authorities directly in order to verify your situation in specific. Thank you.

@Feminist2DaBone Hello Vesselina, we apologize for the delay and inform you that the situation is being verified.
We will get back to you on this matter, by private message, as soon as possible. Thank you.

@l_uums Olá Lu, compreendemos a sua insatisfação, contudo asseguramos que o seu caso não está esquecido, assim que possível retomaremos o contacto.
Obrigada.

@hmfragoso @hmfragoso Hello Hugo, if we can help with some question through this channel we ask you provide us with your booking code.  
For confidential reasons we suggest that you do it by direct message. Thank you.

@PascoFearon Hello Pasco, we understand your dissatisfaction.
We apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.

@DegenTW_ Hello @degentw_, we regret hearing our services did not met your expectations.
If assistance is needed, please contact us  via private message with your booking reference or e-ticket number. Thank you.

@pluviofae Hello Jane,
Please let us know your ticket number so that we can check this situation. 
We recommend that you do so by private message due to confidentiality reasons.
Thank you

@AlineLatinaline Caso pretenda obter mais esclarecimentos sobre este assunto, sugerimos que responda ao mesmo email (sem mudar o assunto) de modo a clarificar as suas questões. Se já o fez, pedimos que aguarde pela resposta que irá ser enviada igualmente por email.
Obrigado (2/2)

@AlineLatinaline Olá Aline.
Verificámos que recebeu uma resposta por email sobre a sua reclamação no dia 20 de Outubro de 2020. (1/2)

@bdicher Hello Bogdan, 
We regret that our service did not meet your expectations. Your feedback is important and will allow us to have some insight as to where we can improve with our services. If we can help with any question, please provide us with your booking code by direct message.

@PawelKo22 @pawelko22 Hello Pawel, in order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.

@SoniaReade2 @rakunteur Hello Sonia, in order to verify, please provide us the process file number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@ARYAN13984147 Hello Aryan, as the situation is being handled via Facebook, we kindly ask you to keep the same channel of conversation. Thank you.

data.text: @michellewelch05 Hello Michelle, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@margotmmeiners Olá Margot, informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@Fernandobr1968 Olá Fernando, pedimos desculpa pela demora e informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@zinia55 @emirates @EmiratesSupport @IndiainSpain @IndiainPortugal Hello Sangheeta,
we are truly sorry for this situation. We have forwarded your considerations to the Lost and Found department. As soon as we have their feedback, we return the contact. Thank you.

data.text: @l_uums Olá Lu, pedimos desculpa pela demora e informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@LannaVenancio Olá, para que possamos verificar, pedimos por favor, que nos indique o código de reserva e o número de bilhete eletrónico. Por razões de confidencialidade, sugerimos que nos indique os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@rakunteur Hello, in order to verify, please provide us the claim number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@RealtySimon Hello Simon, we apologize for the delay on our reply and kindly ask you to send us your complaint number, booking reference and associated e-mail address by private message. Thank you.

@BordBenjamin Hello Bord, we apologize for the delay handling your case and assure you however that it is not forgotten and that every effort is being made to complete the processes as quickly as possible.
Should there be anything else we can help you with, please let us know. Thank you.

@TerrenzVM Hello Terrence, we apologize for the delay on our reply and inform you that your complaint is still under analysis, as soon as it is completed you'll be contacted via e-mail.
We assure you that your case is not forgotten and will be handled as soon as possible. Thank you.

@AtriscWeckel Bonjour Weckel, nous nous excusons pour notre réponse tardive et situation décrite.
Si vous avez toujours besoin d'assistance, nous vous prions de nous indiquer le code de réservation ou numéro de billet électronique par message privé. Merci.

@xdivertid Hola xdiverti, pedimos disculpas por el retraso en nuestra respuesta. Sus reclamaciones están siendo analizadas, así que serán finalizadas luego que sea posible. Cualquier otra cuestión que tenga, no dude en contactarnos. Gracias.

@margotmmeiners Olá Margot,

poderia nos indicar, por mensagem privada, o seu número de processo de reclamação e endereço de email associado, para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.
@Danrm84 @danrm84 Hello Daniel, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.
@CarlosCarvaceou Será todo el año.

@CarlosCarvaceou Hola Carlos,

la ruta entre Lisboa y Boavista será operada Lunes y Sábados 😉

@willitones Olá Wilson, lamentamos os transtornos causados e compreendemos a sua frustração. Logo que haja informação adicional acerca do processo será contactado.
Obrigada.
@SoniaReade2 Hello Sonia, can you please provide us the complaint number? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.
@kktvcamnews Hello @Kktvcamnews, the flight is delayed due to operational reasons. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.

@carlita04bg Hola Carla,
Lamentamos esta situación y pedimos disculpas una vez más por las molestias ocasionadas.
Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier consulta. 
Gracias

@janewakefield Hello Jane, we appreciate your feedback and suggestion.
We remain at your disposal. Thank you.
@cristianpadinc Olá Carlos, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@NachanMachante Bonjour Midonathalie, nous avons répondu à votre message privé. Merci.
@CancelTapPortug For confidentiality reasons, we kindly suggest you send it by private message. Thank you in advance. 2/2

@CancelTapPortug Hello, we apologise for the distress caused by this situation. In order to verify the information, can you inform us your bookings reference, the ticket number and your email address, please? 1/2
@a_khansari Hello Ardéchire, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@DerrynScott Hello Derryn,
in order to verify, please provide us the process file number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@nehaksingh For confidentiality reasons, please provide us the information by private message. Thank you. (3/3)

@nehaksingh Hello Neha,
we are truly sorry to know that the experience did not meet your expectations and for all the inconvenience caused. In order to verify the situation, please provide us the following information: (1/3)
@brendanhahahaha Hello, we replied by private message. Thank you.
@braimoreira Hello Braitner, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
